sentence.Network_en: His father was, like Mr. Micawber, always waiting for something to turn up.
sentence.Network_cn: 他父亲像密考伯先生一样老是盼着交好运.

sentence.Network_en: Dickens'father was immortalized for ever as Mr Micawber in'David Copperfield '.
